ops_unv_tmplt.name: Inter-Cloud-Data-Transfer
ops_unv_tmplt.script_unix:
#!/opt/universal/python3.6/bin/python3 # # # Name : cloud2cloud.py # Origins: Stonebranch # Author : Nils Buer, Abdullah Saglam # Date : 01-02-2021 # # Requires Universal Agent for Linux/Windows # # Copyright (c) Stonebranch, 2020. All rights reserved. # # Purpose: Start an Informatica WF or Task # # Prerequisites: # - Universal Agent for Windows/Linux 6.9 or higher # # # Version History: # 0.1 Nils 01-02-2021 initial # 0.2 Abdullah/Nils 01-02-2021 credentials for script added # 0.x Nils 01-02-2021 initial # 0.x Nils 01-02-2021 initial # 0.3 Nils 02-02-2021 initial # 0.4 Nils 04-02-2021 filter # 0.5 Nils 22-02-2021 rmdir, delete # 0.6 Nils 22-02-2021 mkdir # 0.7 Nils 22-02-2021 cleanup # 0.8 Nils 26-02-2021 dry run added # 0.9 Nils 26-02-2021 dry run added # 1.0 Nils 26-02-2021 dry run added # 1.1 Nils 26-02-2021 cleanup # 1.2 Nils 29-03-2021 copy_url added # 1.3 Nils 14-04-2021 list types and filter for list objects # 1.4 Asaglam 14-04-2021 Monitor object # 1.5 Asaglam 28-05-2021 read stderr stdout # 1.6 Asaglam 01-06-2021 source destination : checks # 1.7 Nils 03-06-2021 fixed list directory action # 1.8 Asaglam 07-06-2021 source destination : checks # 1.9 Asaglam 14-06-2021 source destination : checks # # Used modules
import logging import site import subprocess import sys import time import datetime import requests import json import os
gl_version = "1.9" gl_variable_prefix = "var"
# Task Variables gl_action = "${ops_var_action}" gl_dry_run = True if "${ops_var_dry_run}" == "true" else False gl_rclone_conf = "${ops_var_rclone_conf}" gl_storage_type = "${ops_var_storage_type}".rstrip(" :") + ":" gl_source_storage_type = "${ops_var_source_storage_type}".rstrip(" :") + ":" gl_target_storage_type = "${ops_var_target_storage_type}".rstrip(" :") + ":" gl_source = "${ops_var_source}" gl_target = "${ops_var_target}" gl_directory = "${ops_var_directory}" gl_file_path = "${ops_var_file_path}" gl_list_format = "${ops_var_listformat}" gl_rclone_conf_path = "${_scriptPath('${ops_var_rclone_conf}')}" gl_base_url_uac = "${ops_var_base_url_uac}".rstrip(" /") gl_auth_uac = ("${_credentialUser('${ops_var_rest_credentials_uac}')}", "${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_rest_credentials_uac}')}")
# gl_base_url_uac = "${ops_var_base_url_uac}".rstrip(" /") # gl_auth_uac = ("${_credentialUser('${ops_var_rest_credentials_uac}')}","${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_rest_credentials_uac}')}") gl_sb_rest = None gl_filter = "${ops_var_filter}" gl_filter_type = "${ops_var_filter_type}" gl_interval = "${ops_var_interval}" gl_trigger_on_existence = "${ops_var_trigger_on_existence}" gl_other_parameters = [parameter for parameter in "${ops_var_other_parameters}".strip().split()] gl_time_start = str(datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z")) # -- logging settings DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
logging.basicConfig(level="${ops_var_loglevel}", format=' %(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')
def main(): global gl_sb_rest print_variables() gl_sb_rest = SbRestApi(gl_base_url_uac, gl_auth_uac) if gl_action == "lsd": list_directory(gl_storage_type) pass elif gl_action == "list-objects": list_objects(gl_storage_type, gl_directory, gl_list_format, gl_filter_type, gl_filter) pass elif gl_action == "copy": copy_new(gl_source_storage_type, gl_target_storage_type, gl_source, gl_target, gl_filter_type, gl_filter) pass elif gl_action == "copy-url": copy_url(gl_source, gl_target_storage_type, gl_target) pass elif gl_action == "move": move_new(gl_source_storage_type, gl_target_storage_type, gl_source, gl_target, gl_filter_type, gl_filter) pass elif gl_action == "remove-object": remove_object(gl_storage_type, gl_file_path, gl_filter_type, gl_filter) pass elif gl_action == "remove-object-store": remove_object_store(gl_storage_type, gl_directory) pass elif gl_action == "create-object-store": create_object_store(gl_storage_type, gl_directory) pass elif gl_action == "monitor-object": monitor_objects(gl_storage_type, gl_directory, gl_filter, gl_trigger_on_existence, gl_interval) pass
def print_variables(): """logging.infos out the python and script version and all universal template variables """ logging.info("Python version <<< " + sys.version + " >>>") logging.info("Python sites <<< " + str(site.getsitepackages()) + " >>>") logging.info("Executing task version " + gl_version + " with the following " "parameters") print_defined_variables(gl_variable_prefix)
def print_defined_variables(variable_prefix): """logging.infos out universal template variables""" all_variables = r"""${_scope}""" separate_variables = [variable for variable in all_variables.split(', ') if "ops_" + variable_prefix in variable] logging.info(str(separate_variables).replace(", ", ",\n"))
def list_directory(storage_type): """ list the directory of the given connection type e.g., buckets, containes .. """ # rclone lsd google: try: cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'lsd', storage_type] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters process = subprocess.check_output(cmd) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
out = process.decode(encoding='utf-8', errors='ignore') print(f"###### {storage_type} Container / buckets ######") print(out)
def list_objects(storage_type, directory, list_format, filter_type, filter_name, additional_filter=""): """ list the objects in a directory of the given connection type e.g. s3 keys in a bucket """ # rclone ls azure:stonebranchpm list_output = "" try: logging.info("############ List Objects Action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, list_format, storage_type + directory ] if filter_type != "none": cmd += ["--" + filter_type, filter_name] if additional_filter: cmd += [additional_filter] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters logging.debug(cmd) list_output = execute(cmd) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1) else: print(f"###### object in {directory} ######") print(list_output) return list_output
def monitor_objects(storage_type, directory, filter_name, trigger_on_existence, interval): """ monitor objects in a directory of the given connection type e.g. s3 keys in a bucket """ # rclone lsjson azure:stonebranchpm logging.info("############ Monitor Objects Action ###############") found = False # allow for at least one iteration while not found: list_output = list_objects(storage_type, directory, "lsjson", "include", filter_name, additional_filter="--files-only") list_output_json = json.loads(list_output) if list_output_json: logging.debug("list_output_json") logging.debug(list_output_json) for existing_object in list_output_json: # logging.debug(existing_object["ModTime"]) # logging.debug(trigger_on_existence) if trigger_on_existence == "true": found = True print("Found, Already exists: %s" % existing_object) elif gl_time_start < existing_object["ModTime"]: found = True print("Found, New: %s" % existing_object) # break if not found: logging.info("sleeping for %s seconds now" % interval) time.sleep(float(interval))
def copy_new(source_storage_type, target_storage_type, source, target, filter_type, filter_name): """ Copy files from source to dest, skipping already copied.""" # rclone copy --progress s3:stonebranchpm / test1.txt s3:stonebranchpmtest try: logging.info("############ copy action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'copy', '--progress', source_storage_type + source, target_storage_type + target ] if filter_type != "none": cmd += ["--" + filter_type, filter_name] cmd += ["--error-on-no-transfer", "--log-level", "DEBUG"] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters if gl_dry_run: cmd += ["--dry-run"] logging.debug(cmd) execute(cmd) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def copy_url(source, target_storage_type, target): """ Copy file from url to dest. """ # rclone --config /root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf copyurl https://example.com/blz-loeschungen-aktuell-data.pdf local:in --auto-filename --progress try: logging.info("############ copy_url action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'copyurl', source, target_storage_type + target, '--auto-filename', '--progress' ] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters logging.debug(cmd) execute(cmd) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def move_new(source_storage_type, target_storage_type, source, target, filter_type, filter_name): """ Copy files from source to dest, skipping already copied.""" # rclone move --progress s3:stonebranchpm / test1.txt s3:stonebranchpmtest try: logging.info("############ move action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'move', '--progress', source_storage_type + source, target_storage_type + target ] if filter_type != "none": cmd += ["--" + filter_type, filter_name] cmd += ["--error-on-no-transfer", "--log-level", "DEBUG"] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters if gl_dry_run: cmd += ["--dry-run"] logging.debug(cmd) execute(cmd) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def remove_object(target_storage_type, target, filter_type, filter_name): """ Remove files from dest.""" # rclone delete s3:stonebranchpm / test1.txt try: logging.info("############ remove object action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'delete', target_storage_type + target, '--rmdirs' ] if filter_type != "none": cmd += ["--" + filter_type, filter_name] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters cmd += ["--log-level", "DEBUG"] if gl_dry_run: cmd += ["--dry-run"] logging.debug(cmd) output = execute(cmd) if "eleted" not in output: print("Nothing deleted") exit(1) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e.output) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def remove_object_store(target_storage_type, target): """ Remove empty directories from dest.""" # rclone rmdir s3:stonebranchpm / test1.txt try: logging.info("############ remove object store action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'rmdir', target_storage_type + target ] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters cmd += ["--log-level", "DEBUG"] if gl_dry_run: cmd += ["--dry-run"] logging.debug(cmd) output = execute(cmd) if "eleted" not in output: print("Nothing deleted") exit(1) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print("xxxxxxxxxx except output 1") print(e.output) print("xxxxxxxxxx except output 1") logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def create_object_store(storage_type, directory): """ Create empty directory from dest.""" # rclone mkdir s3:stonebranchpm / test1.txt try: logging.info("############ create object store action ###############") cmd = ['rclone', '--config', gl_rclone_conf_path, 'mkdir', storage_type + directory ] if gl_other_parameters: cmd += gl_other_parameters cmd += ["--log-level", "DEBUG"] if gl_dry_run: cmd += ["--dry-run"] logging.debug(cmd) output = execute(cmd) if "created" not in output: print("Nothing created") exit(1) except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e: print(e) logging.error("Error Code: " + str(e.returncode)) exit(1)
def execute(cmd): pipe_open = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdout=subprocess.PIPE,stderr=subprocess.PIPE, universal_newlines=True) str_output = "" while pipe_open.poll() is None: line_out = pipe_open.stdout.readline() if line_out != "": str_output += line_out logging.debug("LIBRARY STDOUT: " + line_out) line_err = pipe_open.stderr.readline() if line_err != "": str_output += line_err logging.debug("LIBRARY STDERR: " + line_err) stdout_line = line_out + line_err if "Unchanged skipping" in stdout_line and "DEBUG :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("DEBUG :")[1].strip()) if "Copied " in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "There was nothing to transfer" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "ERROR" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("ERROR :")[1].strip()) if "eleted" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "created" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) pipe_open.stdout.close() pipe_open.stderr.close() return_code = pipe_open.wait() return str_output for stdout_line in iter(pipe_open.stdout.readline, ""): print("x") str_output += stdout_line logging.debug("LIBRARY: " + stdout_line) print("LIBRARY: " + stdout_line) # if "Transferred:" in stdout_line and "ETA" in stdout_line: if stdout_line.startswith("Transferred:") and "ETA" in stdout_line: op_memo_text = stdout_line[ stdout_line.index("Transferred:") + 12:].strip() gl_sb_rest.update_task_op_memo(op_memo_text) if "Unchanged skipping" in stdout_line and "DEBUG :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("DEBUG :")[1].strip()) if "Copied " in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "There was nothing to transfer" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "ERROR" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("ERROR :")[1].strip()) if "Deleted" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) if "created" in stdout_line and "INFO :" in stdout_line: print(stdout_line.split("INFO :")[1].strip()) print("xX") pipe_open.stdout.close() return_code = pipe_open.wait() if return_code: print(str_output) raise subprocess.CalledProcessError(return_code, cmd, str_output) return str_output
class SbRestApi: """Stonebranch REST API Class for python
This class is written for web service operations to UAC
Attributes: _base_url: base uac url _auth_uac: authentication for uac _library_version: keeps the class library version """
def __init__(self, base_url, authentication): self._base_url = base_url self._auth_uac = authentication self._library_version = "1.0" logging.info( "REST SB library version " + self._library_version)
def launch_task(self, data_str): url = '%s/resources/task/ops-task-launch' % self._base_url logging.debug('URL: %s' % url) local_headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
response = requests.post(url, headers=local_headers, data=data_str, auth=self._auth_uac, stream=True)
if 200 != response.status_code: logging.error('Response: %s' % response) logging.error('Response: %s' % response.text) exit(1) else: logging.debug('Response 200 received')
def update_task_op_memo(self, op_memo_text): logging.info('Updating task operational memo of %s to %s' % ( "${ops_task_id}", op_memo_text)) url = '%s/resources/taskinstance/updatememo?taskinstanceid=${ops_task_id}' % self._base_url logging.debug('URL: %s' % url) local_headers = {'Content-Type': 'text/plain'} response = requests.put(url, headers=local_headers, data=op_memo_text, auth=self._auth_uac, stream=True, verify=False)
if 200 != response.status_code: logging.error('Response: %s' % response.text) exit(1) else: logging.debug('Response 200 received %s' % response.text)
resp_data = None try: resp_data = response.json() # ... except ValueError: # no JSON returned pass logging.debug("received data: %s" % resp_data)
if __name__ == '__main__': main()

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Directory
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: bucket name, container name, file system directory
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: directory

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Interval
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: interval to check for new files to monitor
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: interval

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Storage Type
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: enter a storage type defined in the Connection File
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: storage_type

ops_unv_tmplt_field_choice.field_value_label: list modification time, size and path
